## awesome-ci pr info

Get pull request info

```
awesome-ci pr info [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help                      help for info
  -c, --merge-commit-sha string   send a given merge commit sha
  -n, --number int                overwrite the issue number
```

```

```
